thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 25 of 3545
thread.title: Holley

author: Holley
title: Holley
text: From start to finish, my first time buying experience with ThriftBooks was excellent. I was shopping for one cookbook and saw that I could order a couple more very inexpensively and receive free shipping. I also like the option of choosing a slightly lesser quality book to enable all shipping to come in one package versus from different destinations. It was not a huge savings for the consumer, but it demonstrates that the company is environmentally friendly.
